privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how MAVU AI collects, uses and protects user information.

collect.title: 1. What information we collect
collect.content:
We collect the following types of information:
• Account information (email, parent's name)
• Child's age (for content customization)
• App usage data
• Voice recordings for request processing (not stored)
• Emotional patterns to improve interaction

use.title: 2. How we use information
use.content:
Collected information is used to:
• Personalize the experience of communication with MAVU
• Provide parents with general information about the child's emotional state
• Improve the quality of our services
• Ensure user safety

protect.title: 3. How we protect information
protect.content:
We apply modern security measures:
• Data encryption during transmission and storage
• Limited access to personal data
• Regular security audits
• COPPA compliance for child protection

share.title: 4. Third-party data sharing
share.content:
We do not sell personal data. Data may be shared:
• With service providers to ensure app functionality
• As required by law
• To protect user rights and safety

rights.title: 5. Your rights
rights.content:
You have the right to:
• Request access to your data
• Correct inaccurate data
• Delete your account and all data
• Withdraw consent to data processing

contact.title: 6. Contacts
contact.content:
For privacy questions, contact:
Email: privacy@mavu.ai

offer.title: Public Offer
offer.intro: This document is an official proposal (offer) to enter into an agreement for the use of MAVU AI service.

terms.title: 1. Terms and definitions
terms.content:
• Service — MAVU AI mobile application
• User — a person who accepted the offer
• Subscription — paid access to Service features

subject.title: 2. Subject of the agreement
subject.content: The Provider grants the User access to the MAVU AI Service functionality on a paid subscription basis. The Service is intended for emotional support of children aged 5-12 years.

price.title: 3. Cost and payment procedure
price.content:
• Subscription cost: $11 per month
• Payment is made through available payment systems
• Subscription is activated immediately after payment confirmation
• Promo code is valid for 30 days from the date of purchase

rights.title: 4. Rights and obligations of parties
rights.content:
The Provider undertakes to:
• Provide access to the Service 24/7
• Ensure data security
• Notify about changes in conditions

The User undertakes to:
• Provide accurate information
• Not violate the terms of use
• Ensure control over the child's use

liability.title: 5. Liability
liability.content:
• The Service does not replace professional psychological help
• The Provider is not responsible for decisions made based on Service recommendations
• Maximum liability is limited to the cost of the paid subscription

termination.title: 6. Termination of agreement
termination.content:
• The User may cancel the subscription at any time
• Refunds are made within 7 days from the date of payment
• The Provider has the right to block access in case of rules violation
